original_text:
“I will drive the northern horde far from you,
    pushing it into a parched and barren land;
its eastern ranks will drown in the Dead Sea
    and its western ranks in the Mediterranean Sea.
And its stench will go up;
    its smell will rise.”
Surely he has done great things!
korean_text: 내가 북쪽 군대를 너희에게서 멀리 떠나게 하여 메마르고 적막한 땅으로 쫓아내리니 그 앞의 부대는 동해로, 그 뒤의 부대는 서해로 들어갈 것이라 상한 냄새가 일어나고 악취가 오르리니 이는 큰 일을 행하였음이니라 하4)시리라

sentences.original_text: I will drive the northern horde far from you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 북방 무리를 너희에게서 멀리 쫓아내리라

sentences.original_text: pushing it into a parched and barren land
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 메마르고 척박한 땅으로 밀어 넣으리라

sentences.original_text: its eastern ranks will drown in the Dead Sea
and its western ranks in the Mediterranean Sea
And its stench will go up
Surely he has done great things
